screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .t2000 file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
screenshot.caption: T2000 file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: Theseus2000 allows users to diagnose and troubleshoot networking- and Internet-related problems. For example, if a user is encountering slow data transfer speeds, they can use Theseus2000 to test their Internet connection's upload and download speeds.

When a user launches Theseus2000, the program creates a file named settings.t2000 . This contains the user's Theseus2000 settings. To adjust their settings, users can use the Settings option available on Theseus2000's main menu.

If a user chooses to connect their Twitter account to Theseus2000 (using the Connect Twitter account option available in the program's Settings menu), Theseus2000 will create a file named twiauth.t2000 . This file contains Twitter access token data that Twitter uses to authenticate Theseus2000.
